      Parameters:
      addPurchaseUseCase - object of the use case
      groupDataAccess - interface for group data access
      itemDataAccess - interface for item data access
      userDataAccess - interface for user data access
      presenter - object of output boundary representing the presenter

  • Method Details

    • controlAddPurchaseUseCase

      public UpdatedLists controlAddPurchaseUseCase(String purchasedItemId, List<String> participatingUsernames, String buyerUsername, float price, String purchaseGroupId)
      This function will be called from the main/view in order to control the use case AddPurchase which occurs whenever a user from a group purchases an item from the planning list. This controller function packages all the required information that the view sends forward into the PurchaseInfo data structure, instantiates the presenter and passes all of this information to call the use case through the input boundary.
      Parameters:
      purchasedItemId - item id of the item being purchased
      participatingUsernames - usernames of the users involved in the purchase
      buyerUsername - username of the user buying the item
      price - price of the item
      purchaseGroupId - id of the group the purchase is made in
      Returns:
      the information sent back by the presenter through the use case to go to the view layer as an updated lists object
